extendedInfo.description: vDrum is an application that lets you create your own beats from preset patterns or create your own.Has a kit administrator with which you can rename or delete your installed kits.From the options menu you can change the background color of the application and the buttons and the transparency of the pads.vDrum offers 4 "Quick Pack" buttons to quickly kits load, assigning the kit earlier in the buttons.SD Card is required to install, create and load new kits.We recommend using the application with external speakers.Kits have been created by DJ Anthrax.013.F.A.Q.Is it possible to create my own kits?Yes, you can do from within the application.How do I create my kit?From the application, opening the menu, you will find an option called "New Pack" when pushed appears the application for kits-building, and can load a kit and create and modify or create a new kit from scratch.I can load samples from my sound library?Yes, clicking on the "song" appears the library of samples of your Android, you can select a sample and add it to the selected pad.Tags: drum, drums, virtual, machine, kit, song, sample, pad, low, latency

reviews.title: So far..
reviews.comment: So good..more stars when more solid features.
reviews.author: danny guy
